alert.note: Alert for Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Southampton and east central Sussex Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homeville, or near Wakefield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wakefield, Homeville, Dory, Manry, Berlin and Littleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
